title: [Question] Are all of you bringing your parents for orientation??

comments.body: It's compulsory no?
No
Anyone whose parents are not coming???
I am not
Yup
ok not related to this but still , when i had my oreintation , my parents were more excited about it than me lol
Can I come alone ?

We tend to forget that our firsts are almost always our parents' firsts as well. It's not just the first time *you're* attending a college orientation, it's also the first time they're attending their child's college orientation :")
Rly? Mail said ward and minimum 1 parent/guardian compulsory

idk i talked to the principal at ec campus and he said it was mandatory ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è. Not like they'll kick you out of the orientation cuz you came alone. it's just that they want to create a better parent-teacher connection due to all those suicides that took place over the last few years
yes
both my parents want to come lol
Bro did you get the email about orientation
yeah
